data: CinéMeraz invites you to capture the essence of special moments with "Meraz 2k25" using your smartphone or camera. This unique event encourages participants to record short clips throughout the fest, creating a personalized journey. From the event's inception to its conclusion, participants curate a compilation of these clips, showcasing the vibrant experiences of "Meraz 2k25". Immerse yourself in the festivities, document cherished memories, and craft a compelling video that reflects the spirit of CinéMeraz. This event seamlessly blends technology with celebration, allowing you to relive and share your unforgettable moments.
Where moments meet memories:- capture the spirit of Meraz!
